means: Low-Income-Schools Teacher Education 低收入学校的教师培养
hear ： 及物动词，指声音进入耳内，但不含有注意的意味，即，只要听觉正常，声音进入耳内，就能听见。但在祈使句中，hear可指有意识的行为。
listen ： 不及物动词，指有意识地倾听，强调行为的过程。
overhear ： 指偶然听到，无意中听到，也指偷听。

list.explanation: 认真听，十分注意(常指聆听命令)

example.en: He can make you listen up with that violin of his.
example.zh: 他能叫你用心倾听他的小提琴曲。

Sentence.sentence: Listening to music at home is one thing, going to hear it being performed live is quite another.

Sentence.sentence: Or perhaps you are the only one who is interested in listening to the ballgame.

Sentence.sentence: Sometimes I act as a listening ear for fellow students to talk over what is bothering them.

Sentence.sentence: Stop listening to other people's songs.

Sentence.sentence: They listened with great interest and then enthusiastically joined in grand conversations about Harry's adventures.

jx.jx_en_mean: To listen to a conversation between others; eavesdrop.
jx.jx_cn_mean: 偷听：听别人的谈话；偷听

jx.jx_en_mean: To tune in and listen to a broadcast.

entry.def: If you listen to someone who is talking or to a sound, you give your attention to them or it.

example.ex: He spent his time listening to the radio...

entry.def: If you listen for a sound, you keep alert and are ready to hear it if it occurs.

example.tran: 我们留神听是不是有脚步声传来。

example.ex: They're both asleep upstairs, but you don't mind listening just in case of trouble, do you?
example.tran: 他们都在楼上睡着了，但你不介意留神听着点以防万一吧？

entry.def: If you listen to someone, you do what they advise you to do, or you believe them.

example.ex: Anne, you need to listen to me this time...
When I asked him to stop, he would not listen.

entry.def: You say listen when you want someone to pay attention to you because you are going to say something important.
You say listen up when you want someone to listen to what you are going to say.

example.ex: Okay, listen up, guys. We've got to talk a little about how you look.
example.tran: 好了，听我说，各位。我们需要谈谈大家的形象问题。

entry.def: You say listen here when you are going to say something important to someone, especially when you are angry at what they have done or said.

example.ex: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!
example.tran: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！

sentences.sentence: "Listen to the sound of this cello"
"We must hear the expert before we make a decision"

means.word_mean: 3. pay close attention to; give heed to;

sentences.sentence: "Heed the advice of the old men"

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English hlysnan 'pay attention to', of Germanic origin

sentences.cn: 听音乐
sentences.en: to listen to music

sentences.cn: 听！那是什么响声？你能听见吗？
sentences.en: Listen! What's that noise? Can you hear it?

sentences.cn: 对不起，我没注意听。
sentences.en: Sorry, I wasn't really listening.

sentences.cn: 我认真听了她说的情况。
sentences.en: I listened carefully to her story.

sentences.cn: 你要是听了我的话，这一切就不会发生了。
sentences.en: None of this would have happened if you'd listened to me.

sentences.cn: 你怎么就不听劝呢？
sentences.en: Why won't you listen to reason ?

sentences.cn: 听着，我有事要告诉你。
sentences.en: Listen, there's something I have to tell you.

sentences.cn: 你能留心听着门铃吗？
sentences.en: Can you listen out for the doorbell?

sentences.cn: 你不应该偷听别人的谈话。
sentences.en: You shouldn't listen in on other people's conversations.

sentences.cn: 听一听这个。
sentences.en: Have a listen to this.

sentences.cn: 他听收音机打发时间。
sentences.en: He spent his time listening to the radio...

sentences.cn: 索尼娅没有用心听。
sentences.en: Sonia was not listening.

sentences.cn: 我们留神听是不是有脚步声传来。
sentences.en: We listen for footsteps approaching...

sentences.cn: 他们都在楼上睡着了，但你不介意留神听着点以防万一吧？
sentences.en: They're both asleep upstairs, but you don't mind listening just in case of trouble, do you?

sentences.cn: 安妮，这次你得听我的。
sentences.en: Anne, you need to listen to me this time...

sentences.cn: 我叫他停下，可他不听。
sentences.en: When I asked him to stop, he would not listen.

sentences.cn: 听我说，我一点钟收工。
sentences.en: Listen, I finish at one.

sentences.cn: 好了，听我说，各位。我们需要谈谈大家的形象问题。
sentences.en: Okay, listen up, guys. We've got to talk a little about how you look.

sentences.cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！
sentences.en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!

sentences.cn: 请大家仔细地听.
sentences.en: Now listen carefully everybody.

sentences.cn: 这孩子, 饶怎么说他也不听.
sentences.en: That child! Whatever you said, he simply wouldn't listen.

sentences.cn: 我叫他别去, 可是他偏偏不听.
sentences.en: I told him not to go, but he just wouldn't listen.

sentences.cn: 她急切地向前弯着腰听他说.
sentences.en: She leant forward eagerly to listen to him.

sentences.cn: 我听见他们在谈话,可是没有听他们在谈什么.
sentences.en: I heard them talking but I didn't listen to what they were saying.

sentences.cn: 不要讲话了! 我在收听新闻.
sentences.en: Pipe down! I'm trying to listen to the news.

sentences.cn: 军人应服从命令.
sentences.en: Soldiers should listen to orders.

sentences.cn: 停住别动,仔细听!
sentences.en: Stop still for a while and listen carefully.

sentences.cn: Leah 回想起倾听低语的一个时期：
sentences.en: Leah reflects on a time she listened to the whispers:
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 而我是真正陪在你身边的人,倾听你的人.
sentences.en: I was the one who was actually by your side and listens to you.

sentences.cn: 中性之劲才是驭土术的精要, 它包含了倾听和等待,为的是找到出手的最佳时机.
sentences.en: Neutral jin is theto earthbending. It involves listening and waiting for the right moment to strike.

sentences.cn: 提问并倾听回答. 对于回答要有所表示、有所行动.
sentences.en: Ask questions . Listen to the answers. Act on the answers.

sentences.cn: 因为忧郁的人确实会倾听他人心声.
sentences.en: Because melancholic people really listen to others.

sentences.cn: 他们倾听他的每一句话.
sentences.en: They listened to his every word.

sentences.cn: 我倾听每个人讲话并一一记录, 特别是对业务人员. 因为,他们一直最接近人群.
sentences.en: I listen to everybody and take notes. Particularly salesmen. They get colse to people.

sentences.cn: 到户外区 、 呼吸空气 、 倾听鸟儿的歌唱、沉思默想 、 给自己做几个薄煎饼.
sentences.en: I step outside, smell the air, listen to the birds , meditate, fix myself some pancakes.

sentences.cn: 心, 每天静静地倾听着花落的声音!
sentences.en: Heart, a day to quietly listen to the voices of the Whispering!

sentences.cn: 注意倾听叫到你的名字.
sentences.en: Listen out for your name to be called.

sentences.cn: 白天花些时间出去,独自倾听自己的心声.
sentences.en: Take time out during the day for quiet time to listen to your inner voice.

sentences.cn: 这倾听将让他们打开心门从而得到超越恐惧的答案.
sentences.en: This listening will allow them to open the door to answers beyond their fear.

sentences.cn: 她仔细倾听着,等候电话铃响.
sentences.en: She listened carefully for the telephone bell.

sentences.cn: 简言之, 真正使我们良好的倾听可以接近对方.
sentences.en: In a word, good listening can really enable us to get closer to each other.

sentences.cn: 杰西仔细倾听老师的教诲并遵照执行.
sentences.en: Jesse listened carefully and carried out the teacher's instructions.

sentences.cn: 所以, 较好的交流者用在倾听上的时间是他们说话时间的两倍.
sentences.en: So, try to remember that good communicators listen twice as much as they speak.

sentences.cn: 接收者需要有好的倾听 、 阅读和观察技巧.
sentences.en: Receivers need good listening, reading, and observational skills.

sentences.cn: 他们倾听着马科林的讲话, 并为他的口才所折服.
sentences.en: They listened to what was said , and hung on Marcoline's lips.

sentences.cn: 倾听那些依靠分享你的杰出作品而成长的人.
sentences.en: Listen to the people who thrive on sharing your good works with others.

sentences.cn: 注意并倾听其他人所讲内容.
sentences.en: Pay attention and listen to what others have to say.

sentences.cn: 研究者们主要是对自然状态中人们的倾听行为以及对此所作的回应进行了观察.
sentences.en: The researchers looked at how people listen in natural situations and seeing how they respond.

sentences.cn: 塞尔玛: 我在倾听我的心扉.
sentences.en: Selma: I listen to my heart.

sentences.cn: 分享倾诉和倾听使生活更容易和更开心快乐.
sentences.en: Sharing and listening make life easier and happier.

sentences.cn: 倾听那声音吧, 然后,把它铭刻在心.
sentences.en: Listen to that sound, and remember it.

sentences.cn: 上帝在倾听?见他的大头鬼去吧!
sentences.en: God is listening Well , kiss my crippled ass!

sentences.cn: 布鲁克斯的大胆计划值得一些国家宇航局的官员们去认真倾听.
sentences.en: There was a good reason why some NASA folks listened to Brooks's bold ideas.

sentences.cn: 如果你处于人身危险, 请倾听你内在的声音,按照所要求的做出反应.
sentences.en: If you are in physical danger, then listen to your inner voice and respond as requested.

sentences.cn: 我就像那夜间的小径,正侧耳倾听着回忆的足音.
sentences.en: I am like the road in the night listening to the footfalls of its memories silence.

sentences.cn: 水手详述沉船的故事时,孩子们屏息倾听着.
sentences.en: The boys listened breathlessly as the sailor detailed the story of the shipwreck.

sentences.cn: 真朋友会细心倾听,真心说出.
sentences.en: True friends will listen with their ears and then speak from their hearts.

sentences.cn: 你能留心听着门铃吗？
sentences.en: Can you listen out for the doorbell?

sentences.cn: 诗 78:1 〔亚萨的训诲诗.〕我的民哪 、 你们要留心听我的训诲 、 侧耳听我口中的话.
sentences.en: Listen, O my people, to my instruction; Incline your ears to the words of my mouth.

sentences.cn: 我正在做吃的, 没太留心听收音机.
sentences.en: I was only listening to the radio with half an ear, while preparing some food.

sentences.cn: 我洗澡时请你留心听著有没有电话来.
sentences.en: Please listen out for the phone while I'm in the bath.

sentences.cn: 我在楼上的时候,请留心听着电话的铃.
sentences.en: Please listen carefully for the telephone bell while I'm upstairs.

sentences.cn: 我留心听着脚步声.
sentences.en: I listened for a footstep.

sentences.cn: 6请你们听我的辩论、 留心 听我口中的分诉.
sentences.en: Hear now my argument; listen to the plea of my lips.

sentences.cn: 众子啊, 现在要听从我, 留心听我口中的话.
sentences.en: Now then, my sons, listen to me; pay attention to what I say.

sentences.cn: 求你留心听我这不出于诡诈嘴唇的祈祷.
sentences.en: Ask you to listen to this prayer not out of the crafty lip of mine.

sentences.cn: 我洗澡时请你留心听着有没有来电话.
sentences.en: Please listen out for the phone while I'm having a shower.

sentences.cn: 亲爱的朋友, 请再留心听着.
sentences.en: Again my friends, please listen carefully.

sentences.cn: 6我留心听, 听见他们说不正直的话.
sentences.en: I have listened attentively, but they do not say what is right.

sentences.cn: 我却认为不该听信这些人的话。
sentences.en: I say that we should never listen to these people.
sentences.from: 15年12月四级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 我痛痛快快骂这些笨家伙一顿,因为他们听信了那套瞎话.
sentences.en: I scolded the stupid fellows well for listening to that tale.

sentences.cn: 她想向我兜售她的那一路货, 可我不会听信她的.
sentences.en: She tried to sell me a bill of goods, but I wouldn't listen to her.

sentences.cn: 不要听信批评家的评论, 继续做需要完成的工作.
sentences.en: Don't listen to the critics, get on with the job that needs to be done.

sentences.cn: 捣乱干系的最快最纯粹的办就是听信谣言.
sentences.en: The quickest and simplest any relationshellop is to listen to gossip.

sentences.cn: 不要听信那些告诉你为什么无法实现你的梦想的人所说的话.
sentences.en: Stop listening to the people who tell you why you will not achieve your dreams.

sentences.cn: 我从不听信推销员的话.
sentences.en: I never listen to ( ie believe ) what salesmen tell me.

sentences.cn: 这个女人被带到了亚历山大的面前, 他听信了她的背信的话.
sentences.en: The woman was brought to Alexander, who listened to her treacheries.

sentences.cn: 英语名言警句粉碎关系的最快最简略的要领就是听信谣言.
sentences.en: The quickest and simplest any relationship is to listen to gossip.

sentences.cn: 但使我失望的是, 不少散户听信媒体的宣传,每当股指反弹时,就逢高割肉?
sentences.en: But to my disappointment, many retailers cut flesh at high when they listen to the media.

sentences.cn: 要是我们听信那些悲观者的论调, 那工程就永远不可能上马.
sentences.en: If we had listened to the prophets of doom, we would never have started the project.

sentences.cn: 你们怎能听信这些谎言?
sentences.en: How can you listen to these lies?

sentences.cn: 我真是昏了头居然听信了你的胡说八道!
sentences.en: I must have been insane to listen to your asinine gibberish!

sentences.cn: 没有人会听信你拙劣的借口.
sentences.en: Nobody would listen to your sorry excuse.

sentences.cn: 阿谀奉承的人正是靠听信谗言的人活命的.
sentences.en: Every flatterer lives at the expense of those who listen to him.

sentences.cn: 这个故事告诉我们的是: 永远不要听信那些习惯消极悲观看问题的人!
sentences.en: The moral of this story: never listen to those who were used to thinking pessimistically!

sentences.cn: 而且一定要去正规的大医院, 别听信偏方.
sentences.en: And will then need to normal at major hospitals, do not listen to prescriptions.

sentences.cn: 不要听信流言蜚语!
sentences.en: Don't listen to scandal!

sentences.cn: 难道仅仅是因为大众不听信忠言?
sentences.en: Is this because the majority just won't listen to reason?

sentences.cn: 别听信谣言.
sentences.en: Don't listen to gossip.

sentences.cn: 你不要听信谣言.
sentences.en: You should not listen to rumour.

sentences.cn: 破坏关系的最快速和最简单的方法是听信于谣言.
sentences.en: The quickest and simplest way to wreck any relationship is to listen to gossip.

sentences.cn: 他不会蠢到去听信谣言的。
sentences.en: He's not so daft as to listen to rumours.

sentences.cn: 听着，我有事要告诉你。
sentences.en: Listen, there's something I have to tell you.

sentences.cn: 你能留心听着门铃吗？
sentences.en: Can you listen out for the doorbell?

sentences.cn: 他们都在楼上睡着了，但你不介意留神听着点以防万一吧？
sentences.en: They're both asleep upstairs, but you don't mind listening just in case of trouble, do you?

sentences.cn: 你给我听着，小姐。别那样叫我！
sentences.en: Listen here, young lady. Don't you call me that!

sentences.cn: 听着，你为什么不一起参加呢？
sentences.en: Listen, why won't you come along?
sentences.from: 17年12月四级真题(第一套)| 听力

sentences.cn: 老奶奶叨絮不休, 不过我们还是耐心地听着.
sentences.en: The old granny talked endlessly, but we listened to her with great patience.

sentences.cn: 客人坐在那里,听着她愈走愈远的脚步声.
sentences.en: The visitor sat and listened to her retreating feet.

sentences.cn: 如果你看重你们的生命,而不是一举被歼灭, 那就仔细听着, 列奥尼达.
sentences.en: If you value your lives over your complete annihilation, listen carefully, Leonidas.

sentences.cn: 她在山顶上大声喊着,然后聆听着回声.
sentences.en: She shouted on the mountaintop and listened for the echo.

sentences.cn: 我们听着,但什么也没听见.
sentences.en: We listened but we heard nothing.

sentences.cn: 听着, 我知道你不够专业.
sentences.en: Listen, I know this is unprofessional.

sentences.cn: 听着, 郝波, 你知道, 你很走运.
sentences.en: Listen, Hobo , you're very lucky, you know.

sentences.cn: 我听着河水流动的声音,数着天上的星星.
sentences.en: I listened to river current and counted the stars in the sky.

sentences.cn: 你听着, 小鬼,当我派的人到你那个乡下小镇去找不到你的时候, 我还很担心哪.
sentences.en: Listen, kid, I was worried when I couldn't get ahold of you in hick town.

sentences.cn: 这个人十分吃惊地看着席德说: “ 听着, 先生, 我的名字不叫彼得, 我叫威尔弗莱德. ”
sentences.en: The man looked at Sid in astonishment. " Listen, Mister, my name's not Peter, it's Wilfred. "

sentences.cn: 只需要听着, 并按一个按钮或是方便时接起就行.
sentences.en: Just listen along, and press a button or pick up when it's convenient.

sentences.cn: 他侧耳听着它吱吱吱舐食的声音.
sentences.en: He listened to her licking lap.

sentences.cn: 他专心地听着我描述各部分的结构.
sentences.en: He listened attentively to my brief rehearsal of the structure of parts.

sentences.cn: 在他听着我说话的时候, 他显得很关心.
sentences.en: As he listened to me, he looked concerned.

sentences.cn: 心, 每天静静地倾听着花落的声音!
sentences.en: Heart, a day to quietly listen to the voices of the Whispering!

sentences.cn: 我认真听着,却不是很明白她的话,直到来年的春天.
sentences.en: I listened carefully but I couldn't understand her untill the next spring.

sentences.cn: 听着, 我遇见一个人, 这个人说你是有权解决这个问题的.
sentences.en: But listen, I met a man, who said you could solve this problem.

sentences.cn: 士兵现在正在立正站着, 听着上校发命令.
sentences.en: The soldiers are standing at attention now, listening to the colonel.

sentences.cn: 听着, 哈里, 他们抓到了西里斯.
sentences.en: C : Listen, Harry, they've captured Sirius.

sentences.cn: 我一面听着, 一面为他说的话感到难为情, 同时眼睛注视着他额上那些深陷的皱纹.
sentences.en: I listened, smarting at his words, my eyes wincing into his surrounding wrinkles.

sentences.cn: “嘉莉专心听着,没打算回答, 她想不出什么值得说的话.
sentences.en: Carrie was listening without attempting to reply. She could think of nothing worth while to say.
sentences.from: 英汉文学 - 嘉莉妹妹

sentences.cn: 他们倾听着马科林的讲话, 并为他的口才所折服.
sentences.en: They listened to what was said , and hung on Marcoline's lips.

sentences.cn: 我的朋友, 你的声音飘荡在我的心里, 宛若海水的低吟,萦绕在聆听着的松林间.
sentences.en: Your voice , my friend, wander in my heart, like the muffled sound of the sea among these listening pines.

sentences.cn: 艾夫斯听着工人们要争取更多钱的要求.
sentences.en: Ives listened to the workers'demand for more money.

Sentence.sentence: Leah reflects on a time she listened to the whispers: About the time my daughter was five years old, I started having a sense that ‘this isn't right.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They listen carefully to their opponents' views.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: I say that we should never listen to these people.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Listen to other people's advice.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Listening to the radio came second.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: When asked which activity would be the most difficult to give up for a week, 48% said listening to music.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Listen to the teacher's explanation.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Why do Japanese listeners sometimes close their eyes while listening to a speech?
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: For example, several months after listening to an informative speech, Pete Gentry in North Carolina rescued his brother who is choking on food, by using the method taught by student speaker, Julie Paris.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: By listening to the morning news
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Again, the point is to listen hard while keeping the pen moving.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: During every one of these lectures, I try to listen, I really try.
Sentence.come: 2018年12月四级真题（第一套）听力 Section B

Sentence.sentence: I take a knitting project with me everywhere, especially when I have to sit still and listen.
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: While there's no conclusive evidence on exactly what we should be eating and when, the consensus is that we should listen to our own bodies and eat when we're hungry.
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第三套）阅读 Section B
